title: Chicken Noodle Soup
directions: Drizzle a pot with olive oil.
Begin cooking the carrots, onions, and celery for a few minutes.
Chop chicken and add to pot.
Pour chicken broth and water over.
Bring to a boil and cook until chicken start to fall apart
Add in the uncooked egg noodles and cook until they are cooked through.
Serve with a nice crusty bread.
Place everything (except the noodles) in the crock pot.
Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high 3-4 hours.
45 minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred.
Return to pot. Turn crock pot on high and add egg noodles.
After about 30 minutes noodles will be done and dinner is served.
ingredients: 2 cups water (may need to add more)
2 cups of carrots diced (just eye ball it)
2 cups of celery diced (just eye ball it)
1 tsp of garlic salt (or use minced garlic)
